categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Control Aleph-One was the callsign of a male Human assigned to Revos Spaceport's Bunker Aleph-One. During Wraith Squadron's Mission to Storinal, Garik Loran and Atril Tabanne stormed the bunker. Aleph-One tried to draw his blaster but was shot by Tabanne in the face, instantly killing him.
He had a daughter named Sakira, which was used as the code in order to recall the spaceport's TIE Fighter's back to base.
